Subject: Laptop black screen
Description: After updating the endpoint client to the latest version, the update failed, and some laptops are displaying a black screen after the user logs in.
What_We_Know__c:
19.05
- After updating the endpoint client to the latest version, the update failed, and some laptops are displaying a black screen after the user logs in.
- asked for further details
- upgrade style: Some using EPP and some using  Intune.
- client version: 6.0.1.6 to 6.2.4.1
- Widows 11
- Till now 6 laptops
- First, the laptop got stuck, and after a restart and login, the screen turns black.
- need to check this internally to see how to proceed

20.05
- asked the customer what happens after the black screen
- asked for a remote session to test with the latest client

21.05
- sent the customer the offline patch for the new client - 6.2.4.2
- applied the offline patch
- customer is hosted by us
- asked the customer to film the computer what happens after restarting (after black screen)
- asked them to install the 6.2.4.2 agent instead of 6.2.4.1
- the customer sent us a video recording
- involved T2 to have a look

22.05
- followed up regarding the 6.2.4.2 client
- asked the customer if they also receive the BSOD
- asked them to also test with the release candidate for 5.9.4.3
- the customer said he will keep us updated after installing 6.2.4.2

26.05
- the customer installed EPP Client 6.2.4.2 software to two laptops. It was successfully installed on one laptop, but the installation failed on the other.
- asked if they experienced the black screen again
- the customer says they are not facing the black screen issue anymore
- asked them to delete the old upgrade jobs and create a new one, since 1 upgrade failed
Next_Steps__c:
19.05
- waiting on the customer to provide further details
- check this internally with Adi and T2

20.05
- waiting on the customer

21.05
- waiting on the customer to send us the recording
- waiting on T2

22.05
- waiting for the feedback from the customer

26.05
- waiting for further feedback from the customer
Solution_Comment__c:
- the 6.2.4.1 client caused black screen issues, which was fixed by the newest client 6.2.4.2 - confirmed by the customer
- the customer also confirmed the ticket can be closed
